verses.verse: Don't<WH7065> be envious of evil<WH7451> men;<WH582> neither desire to be with them:<WH183>
for their hearts<WH3820> plot<WH1897> violence,<WH7701> and their lips<WH8193> talk<WH1696> about mischief.<WH5999>
Through wisdom<WH2451> a house<WH1004> is built;<WH1129> by understanding<WH8394> it is established;<WH3559>
by knowledge<WH1847> the rooms<WH2315> are filled<WH4390> with all rare<WH3368> and beautiful<WH5273> treasure.<WH1952>
A wise<WH2450> man<WH1397> has great power;<WH3581> and a knowledgeable<WH1847> man<WH376> increases<WH553> strength;<WH3581>
for by wise guidance<WH8458> you wage<WH6213> your war;<WH4421> and victory<WH8668> is in many<WH7230> advisors.<WH3289>
Wisdom<WH2454> is too high<WH7311> for a fool:<WH191> he doesn't<WH6605> open his mouth<WH6310> in the gate.<WH8179>
One who plots<WH2803> to do evil<WH7489> will be called<WH7121> a<WH4209> schemer.<WH1167>
The schemes<WH2154> of folly<WH200> are sin.<WH2403> The mocker<WH3887> is detested<WH8441> by men.<WH120>
If you falter<WH7503> in the time<WH3117> of trouble,<WH6869> your strength<WH3581> is small.<WH6862>
Rescue<WH5337> those who are being led<WH3947> away to death!<WH4194> Indeed,<WH2820> hold back those who are staggering<WH4131> to the slaughter!<WH2027>

If you say,<WH559> "Behold,<WH3045> we didn't know this;<WH8505>" doesn't he who weighs the hearts<WH3826> consider<WH995> it?<WH5341> He who keeps your soul,<WH5315> doesn't<WH3045> he know it?<WH7725> Shall he not render to every man<WH120> according to his work?<WH6467>
My son,<WH1121> eat<WH398> honey,<WH1706> for it is good;<WH2896> the droppings of the honeycomb,<WH5317> which are sweet<WH4966> to your taste:<WH2441>
so you shall know<WH3045> wisdom<WH2451> to be to your soul;<WH5315> if you have found<WH4672> it,<WH3426> then there will be a reward,<WH319> your hope<WH8615> will not be cut off.<WH3772>
Don't<WH693> lay in wait, wicked<WH7563> man,<WH5116> against the habitation of the righteous.<WH6662> Don't<WH7703> destroy his resting place:<WH7258>
for a righteous<WH6662> man falls<WH5307> seven times,<WH7651> and rises up again;<WH6965> but the wicked<WH7563> are overthrown<WH3782> by calamity.<WH7451>
Don't<WH8055> rejoice when your enemy<WH341> falls.<WH5307> Don't<WH3820> let your heart be glad<WH1523> when he is overthrown;<WH3782>
lest Yahweh<WH3068> see<WH7200> it,<WH7489> and it displease him,<WH7725> and he turn away his wrath from him.<WH639>
Don't<WH2734> fret yourself because of evildoers;<WH7489> neither be envious<WH7065> of the wicked:<WH7563>
for there will be no reward<WH319> to the evil<WH7451> man;<WH5216> and the lamp of the wicked<WH7563> shall be snuffed out.<WH1846>
My son,<WH1121> fear<WH3372> Yahweh<WH3068> and the king.<WH4428> Don't<WH6148> join those who are rebellious:<WH8138>
for their calamity<WH343> will rise<WH6965> suddenly;<WH6597> the destruction<WH6365> from them both<WH8147>—who knows?<WH3045>
These also are sayings of the wise.<WH2450> To show<WH6440> partiality<WH5234> in judgment<WH4941> is not good.<WH2896>
He who says<WH559> to the wicked,<WH7563> "You are righteous;<WH6662>" peoples<WH5971> shall curse<WH5344> him,<WH5971> and nations shall abhor him<WH2194>—
but it will go well<WH5276> with those who convict<WH3198> the guilty,<WH2896> and a rich blessing<WH1293> will come on them.<WH935>
An<WH7725> honest<WH5228> answer<WH1697> is like a kiss<WH5401> on the lips.<WH8193>
Prepare<WH3559> your work<WH4399> outside,<WH2351> and get your fields<WH7704> ready.<WH6257> Afterwards,<WH310> build<WH1129> your house.<WH1004>
Don't<WH5707> be a witness against your neighbor<WH7453> without cause.<WH2600> Don't<WH6601> deceive with your lips.<WH8193>
Don't<WH559> say, "I will do<WH6213> to him as he has done<WH6213> to me;<WH7725> I will render to the man<WH376> according to his work.<WH6467>"
I went<WH5674> by the field<WH7704> of the sluggard,<WH376> by the vineyard<WH3754> of the man<WH120> void<WH2638> of understanding;<WH3820>
Behold,<WH5927> it was all grown over with thorns.<WH7063> Its surface<WH6440> was covered<WH3680> with nettles,<WH2738> and its stone<WH68> wall<WH1444> was broken down.<WH2040>
Then I saw,<WH2372> and considered well.<WH7896> I saw,<WH7200> and received<WH3947> instruction:<WH4148>
a little<WH4592> sleep,<WH8142> a little<WH4592> slumber,<WH8572> a little<WH4592> folding<WH2264> of the hands<WH3027> to sleep;<WH7901>
so your poverty<WH7389> will come<WH935> as a robber,<WH1980> and your want<WH4270> as an armed<WH4043> man.<WH376>
